about.intro: MangaBox is a streamlined client for your Komga media server. To access your own, self-hosted server please enter the server URL in the login field, then your username and password.
about.disclaimer: MangaBox is not designed to access external sources and does not provide content; it is only designed to display and navigate your own libraries and read your own books.
about.features.title: Features:
about.features.connect: Connect easily to your Komga server from the onboarding screen
about.features.theme: Light and dark themes with custom color highlights
about.features.touch: Touch and gesture support for tablets and phones
about.features.reader: Beautiful two-page reading with paper-style visuals, page-turn animations and thumbnail previews
about.features.sync: Sync reading progress with the server
about.features.filter: Quickly filter libraries by language, read status, and reading direction
about.features.search: Global search for series and volumes
sort.startnewtoold.long: By Start Date New to Old
sort.startoldtonew.long: by Start Date Old to New
sort.stopnewtoold.long: by End Date New to Old
sort.stopoldtonew.long: by End Date Old to New
